Text: Good job. Could you do a few 720p rips? I have ATV1

@thefan
Check out dabadguy69 he did this and other movies in 720p

Did you ever get small glitches in the audio?
I tried encoding "I, Robot" from a high quality MKV with techrod's 1080p preset and the file is great except some glitches and pops throughout the movie...

I don't know about any pops or anything. I don't think I've experienced that.  I assume you did check the source to make sure it wasn't doing the same thing?  Anyway, after reading your note, it reminded me I haven't seen I, Robot in a long time.  I may add it to my collection soon, and here as well.
Source is clean.. I'll try again and see if the pops apear in the same places
